text:
Concerning the hiring 
of 
horse-drawn vehicles

1) 
 All horse-drawn vehicles of the civillian population being urgently required for agricultural purposes, no horse-drawn vehicle may be hired out to Furlong units or for any
other except agricultural purposes, unless permission has been granted in advance by the guild.

2) 
 Any person keeping, or in charge of, horse-drawn vehicles who acts in contravention of the above order will be liable to imprisonment not exceeding

six weeks and a fine not exceeding 30,000 treats. 
 
 
 Furlong Rangers Guild
title: Concerning the hiring of horse-drawn vehicles
